condition.ab: Regularly cut at the top, bottom and the left sides. The column is badly damaged; and lost the beginning of the lines. It is obvious that the papyrus was folded at least five vertical times and one horizontal. Kollesis at the beginning of the col. 160. The papyrus has a dark brown color. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated the new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the taxpayer.
